subject: Re: '469 availability
author: purplespacefriend
full_text:
I just want to be very clear, I just don't have the time to make 
boxes for many, it's not a matter of having the 469s, or any other 
parts. I'm about going nuts trying to work on this stuff constantly. 
When summer finally gets here, I plan on doing long bike rides, not 
sitting in the basement all summer.

 Frank-S

 --- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, Marlboro63@... wrote:
>
> Hi Frank,
>  
> I know I have offered before but you haven't responded.  Your wife  
can't 
> complain if people donate to your research could she?  You have 
done  so much for 
> this field that some people should be allowed to donate to you  
without 
> expecting anything in return.  What do you think?
>  
> Jeff
